Posts.Content: hi I know how u feel , my mum will be starting chemo soon , at the mo she calm about it also joked with my 8 year old,Â nanny will go bald , I know it might sounds strange, but I think its getting us prepared , and its the best way for us to deal with it if we joke , I know its serious but people look at things different
Posts.Title: Scared about my mums chemo!
